title: X Analysis: @pbteja1998 - AI Agent Squad Guide (Clawdbot)

context.summary: Francisco shared viral guide on building multi-agent Mission Control using Clawdbot. 124K views, 876 likes. EXTREMELY relevant - validates our architecture.

analysis.post_summary: Complete guide to building 10-agent AI team using Clawdbot. Covers: SOUL.md for identity, AGENTS.md for operations, HEARTBEAT.md for periodic checks, shared Mission Control database, task workflows, notifications, daily standups.
analysis.author_credibility: Bhanu Teja P - Founder of SiteGPT (AI chatbot for customer support). Previously exited Feather for $250K. Building SiteGPT from $10K to $1M ARR.
analysis.relevance: EXTREMELY HIGH - Uses exact same Clawdbot framework we use. His Mission Control = our Mission Control. His SOUL.md = our SOUL.md.
key_insights: Staggered cron heartbeats (agents wake 2 min apart, not all at once)
WORKING.md for current task state (we use state.json + active-thread.md)
Thread subscriptions so agents auto-follow conversations
Daily standup cron at end of day summarizing all agent work
Cheaper models for heartbeat checks, expensive for creative work
